text: 2.5 Kis 19.6, Ais 61.6, Hos 14.2, Mal 1.11, Lom 12.1, Epe 2.21-22, Plp 4.18, Hib 13.15-16, Lep 1.6 Nɨbi abe kab tep pel mɨdep okok mɨdebɨm. Anɨgɨl mɨdem, God Kawnan ne ak kɨli kal yad tek yenɨgel agɨl, nɨbop dɨl kal anɨb ak gɨlɨlɨg gup. Pen God nɨbop aglek, nɨbi bɨ God nop sɨbogep okok abe yenɨgabɨm. Anɨgɨl mɨdem, God Kawnan ne ak nɨbop gek, nɨbi Jisas Klays nop gos nepɨm. Gos nɨŋɨd, God nop tep gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, nɨbi ke dɨl God nop sɨbog ñɨnɨmɨb.
